From: James Bierly [mailto:bierlyje@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, September 01, 2011 4:08 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: James Bierly - MBO Partners Conversation
I will be available at 1pm Central time. If something comes up I will let you know and we can reschedule. On Thu, Sep 1, 2011 at 2:55 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: When: Friday, September 02, 2011 2:00 PM-2:45 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada). Where: Call James at 641-757-9008
Note: The GMT offset above does not reflect daylight saving time adjustments.
*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*
Hi James,
I apologize, but is there any way we could reschedule for 2:00pm EST (1:00 pm Central) tomorrow? Our offices are closing early due to the holiday weekend.
Please let me know if this will work for you.
Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you!
Nicolette
A conversation to learn more about MBO Partners Are there any special issues you would like to discuss on our call? Possibility of consulting work for the U.S. Navy that may not require relocation.
